law.catch_line: Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board shall issue a temporary license to an applicant...

text.section:
Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board shall issue a temporary license to an applicant who:
Demonstrates to the satisfaction of the Board that granting a temporary license to the applicant is in the public interest and does not pose a substantial risk of harm to the public health or welfare or the environment;
Meets the requirements of §§ 13-303 and 13-306 of this subtitle; and
Passes an examination on applicable Maryland well construction regulations.

While it is effective, a temporary license to practice well drilling authorizes the holder to practice well drilling subject to the same restrictions imposed on the holder of a license of the same category and class.

A temporary license expires at the first to occur of the following:
When the Board issues or refuses to issue a license under § 13-306 of this subtitle; or
On the expiration date that the Board designates on the temporary license.
